WorkItem.Description:
I switched my professions and the optimizer still tell me to switch my glove enchant to hyperspeed acelerator.
 
NVM the picture, the prior bug was something else I found. I noticed that if you don't pick the "epic" gem filters and pick the jewelcrafting one, the optimizer will give you the warning on your current equipped dragon's eye and nightmare tear... which is also a bug since I have selected the jewelcrafting template, but didn't want epic gems because the gear is not worth using those.
 
Keep up the good work.
WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Engineering enchants still available after profession change

Comments.Message: If you aren't an engineer why are you marking hyperspeed accelerators available to the optimizer?

I have no clue how to remove it.. since it was added automatically when I was an engineer.

It should be automatically removed if you are not an engineer.
Read the documentation on marking things available for the Optimizer, or watch the Tour of Rawr video.
We don't want to automatically remove it because there could potentially be a data error where your professions didn't load into Rawr but the rest did.
